storyInfo: Underestimating his enemy, the Left-hand Knight gives Maria an opening to win with a single blow. But Maria is not happy with her victory, finding herself perplexed. With the Left-hand Knight routed, the undercurrent begins to swell.

attributes.content: 4:12 PM \ Cloudy, Kazimierz Fireblade Arena
Independent knight Maria Nearl vs. 'Left-hand' Tytus Topola, one hour and twenty minutes in
Right now, this arena... is host to a once-in-a-lifetime event!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: She gets knocked down, and she gets up, again and again! That spark of light still hasn’t left the eyes of the audience! It’s as if it’s taken root in the smeared blood and soil of the arena!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: That one spark of light—! Just like a candle lit in the night! Under the ever more oppressive onslaught of Tytus, a man who lives to crush the will of his opponents—
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: —It’s still alive!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Haahh... haaahh...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: You... stand once again. You...
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: I see. The most miniscule Arts to heal your wounds, never running out, all the while looking for weaknesses—
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: —Does it feel good? Enduring your flesh on the verge of collapse for so long?
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Hah... hah... no, I’m fine...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Stubborn.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Nothing more than a parlor trick.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: She—she blocks! It’s the first time she’s done it! Maria has blocked Tytus’s attack!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: What... did my blade glance...?
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: No, it was dead on... but you’re hitting—a lot less hard.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: You... you have to get tired too, Tytus...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I do?
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Certainly... I have wasted far too much time on you.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Let me end this.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: He hit again—!
attributes.name: Tourist

attributes.content: The flow’s completely changed... Who knows what’ll happen now...
attributes.name: Tourist

attributes.content: Gugh...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Hmph. I know all your little tricks now. No reason to cede you a single chance more.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: (Too fast—)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: He! Gives! No! Quarter!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: A relentless rush! Not letting Nascent Nearl catch her breath! Will this finally put out that last spark of light?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Can that girl... even hold on anymore? This match’s boring now, I’m done...
attributes.name: Tourist A

attributes.content: ...That one’s Maria Nearl, right...? Margaret’s little sister?
attributes.name: Tourist B

attributes.content: Really? I’ve been coming to the Majors for two years now, and she’s nowhere on the same level.
attributes.name: Tourist A

attributes.content: But when they flip the script, that’s what’s worth seeing, isn’t it?
attributes.name: Tourist B

attributes.content: I mean...
attributes.name: Tourist A

attributes.content: Maria!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Maria! Stand up straight!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Vision’s blurry.
Don’t blink, Maria.
Blink, and they’ll never open again.
Maria, you are gifted with a pair of pegasian eyes.
Maria. Stand. Come, come forth.
Grandpa...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Cry not, my child.
What is the motto of the Nearl family?
'Fear neither hardship nor darkness...'
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I do not regret the past. It brings me so much joy that Margaret chose to walk a different path.
Margaret...?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: In confronting all hardship, all darkness, generation after generation, each of our us have made our own choices.
Margaret chose the path least realistic.
Has she... has your sister ever spoken to you of her vision of a knight?
'To be a knight is to be the noble light that illuminates the land...'
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Heh, heh. At such a young age...
Wishing only to be light.
Wishing only to dispel the hardship and darkness.
...One second later, and you may have been freed from this meaningless battle. Why stand up?
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Uncle Młynar... was wrong.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: It wasn’t at all... It was only a sigh...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Deep breaths. Deep breaths, Maria.
Keep exerting yourself and you won’t win. Use his arrogance. Use his overconfidence.
What would Margaret do?
Just one opening... just one opening.
Mph—
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: And suddenly, a burst of light! What in the world just happened?! Are we gonna have to give out free sunglasses next time—?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: This is the first time the Left-hand Knight Tytus has backed off! There’s Arts! No doubt about it, this is Maria Nearl’s own Arts! Is she using Arts to turn the tables at the last minute?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Ooooh! There’s been a small tremor in Maria’s figures! But even still, the odds are just astounding! The numbers are rivalling corporate donations, now! Would you look at this prize pool?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The Radiant Knight...
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: ...No, only a pale shadow of an imitation.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: You... you will pay dearly for this act of contempt.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Maria—!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: You can do it! Go, Nearl!
attributes.name: Tourist

attributes.content: Hey! Maria Nearl! You can do it!
attributes.name: Tourist

attributes.content: Maria! Stay focused—! Beat him into the ground!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: The cheers! Everyone out there is cheering for Maria, now!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: But even then—! Tytus still has free rein to walk the arena!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: (Blocked it!)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: And the tale keeps twisting! They’re both spent, but she’s actually made a massive comeback!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Ladies! And! Gentlemen! Keep your eyes right on the prize, whether it’s the marvelous match or the extravagant prize pool! It’s all shaped up to be the most worthwhile event of the season yet!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Let’s see more coin and more screams! Gotta let your knights know just how hyped you are!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: You—you have the nerve to block my attacks! Leaning on your puny smattering of Arts?!
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Arrogant. I hate the arrogant. I loathe them.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: It is readily apparent that Tytus could have won this. His vision tunneled on trampling the Nearls’ dignity. This middling, neglectful means of combat always tends to offer the other side an advantage.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: I-I see...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: After all, she is the Radiant Knight’s sister, and a certain 'Nearl’s' granddaughter. Hah. My past self could’ve only pictured that fear-inspiring old lout upon hearing the name 'Nearl.'
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Such is the decline of the knightly family, it would make one weep. Compared to the corporate, a knightly family’s dreary class conflicts truly are so fragile.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: The Association controls the entire noble class, now...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: And so we control the Knights Association.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: We just... received word from a lot of our sponsors... They want the Left-hand Knight to end the battle ASAP...
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: They’re worried that Tytus will lose. But there is no harm in him losing. The sticking point is how hot that topic is, and on that, I am very much satisfied.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: You, um, think so?
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Mm... he is the commander of the Blade Helmet Knightclub. Arrogant, believes the universe revolves around himself. But he is undeniably strong, and sublime in the art of torturing his enemy’s will to fight.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: In all previous competitions, he relished his opponents kneeling in surrender. And so...
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: He is sure to lose.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Haahh... haaahh...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: (No, need to be steady... can’t stand upright... just, stay like this... and breathe...)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Enough!
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Maria—!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: (Maria... should’ve long since reached her limit... Even in her duel with Ingra, she never got hit this bad...)
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: —You’ve shed your blood for this! Grit your teeth, Maria!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Win!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Humiliating... I’ve wasted my time humoring nothing but trash...
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Will you beg for my mercy only once I have crippled you?
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: You’re just like 'Whislash' was—prepare yourself!
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Now—!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I’m still trying to learn from Margaret. The way she used Arts. That turn of her wrists.
But—
You... block me again?!
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: You utter—
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: N-Now that’s no coincidence! Maria’s once again blocked the Left-hand Knight’s onslaught! What’s going on?! Could Tytus be toying with the already cornered Nearl!?
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: ...Good. Very good. I don’t know what you’re thinking... but no matter. I will crush every speck of your light to dust.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Come.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: Look closely, y’all! This is the first time the Left-hand Knight’s ever taken that stance! The first time he’s ever let his opponent pull one over on him!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Even against Nascent Nearl, don’tcha think this is a little extreme?! No! Anyone who knows Tytus knows it’s not! All his fans here in the arena know the score!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: But he’s really hit his head against it today! Maria’s resolve hasn’t wavered one bit! I’ve gotta admit, folks, the way she’s hanging in there, even I’m shedding a couple tears!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Listen up! Everyone who supports Maria Nearl gets an entry in a post-match lottery! Your chance to win is a lofty 0.2%! Who wants to be the lucky one?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: —Something isn’t right.
Fatigued, timid, the fear of humiliation overcoming her, pushed to the edge as she is—
In her heart lies only victory. She wills to win. She’s conjured countless ways to grasp this one last chance firm.
But in this instant, she can only question that victory she’s been pursuing all this time.
...Maria Nearl, for what reason did you join the Major? Glory? Wealth? Or was it your family?
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: For... myself.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Nothing more... Mr. Tytus.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...Hmph.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: An instant’s feint. Arts focused on your shield. You really do... have the blood of a pegasus... tch.
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: You fought a radiant fight, Nearl...
attributes.name: Left-hand Knight

attributes.content: We’ve just had—the lengthiest duel of this entire season—! And the one who fell was none other than 'Left-hand' Tytus Topola!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Who could’ve seen this coming—! I ask you! Who could’ve seen this coming?!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: Completely unreal odds and titanic prize money—hey, show us those numbers, now—this is enough to start your own little business!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: A miracle—! No doubt about it, this is a miracle! Maria Nearl! The Nearl family has brought us a miracle once again!
attributes.name: Greatmouth Mob

attributes.content: The audience all wait.
They wait for Maria to raise the scratch-ridden sword in her grip, and declare victory.
An upset to talk about.  Astronomical wagers. A soul-stirring, heartrending comeback.
(What now?)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Is this the Major? What is it you won? What did you get from all this?
Glory, wealth, your family’s honor, but what is it you’re missing...? Hm, what is it you’re missing?
And without much time to think about it, as if in pure response to the cheering all around her, Maria holds her sword up high.
Only the pain, sharp, radiating from her hand, overcomes the applause.
Hfff...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: (I can’t... I can’t stand—)
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Maria!
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: A... Auntie?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Maria... Maria...
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: A-Auntie Zofia... let go, let go, it hurts...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Oh, sorry... did you break a bone??
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Mm-hm... but it’s no big deal...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Maria... I’m sorry... I might’ve been too harsh on you before.
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: You’re just like your sister. You’re a knight, and you should be able to choose your own path—
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: Maria...?
attributes.name: Zofia

attributes.content: I might... really be nothing like my sister.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: ...Maria won. That match’ll have been broadcast on every terminal in the four cities.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: But... it’s not that simple. You gotta help her, Młynar.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Truly a miracle. If you’re so worried for Maria, why ask me to help her, and her to give up on her idiotic path to knighthood?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Młynar!
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: That’s enough... If the spokesmen and the Knights Association are to directly intervene, I won’t have a single hand to lend...
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: This is precisely why I was opposed to Maria becoming a competition knight in the first place.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Maria decided to do this for her family, y’know.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Nobody ever asked her to... Don’t give me those self-righteous excuses.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: There are times when responsibility makes a burden. For the sake of a life lived clearer, we should all be a little smarter.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Młynar, you...
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: —If this is all you came to tell me, you can go now. I have other things to deal with. I’m still not done yet with some files the Director wanted...
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: ...I thought you were down in a slump, Młynar.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Don’t be presumptuous, Marcin.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Yeah. Maybe you’re right. You’ve really disappointed us all, Młynar.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: And the same for all of you.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: If you can’t even bring yourself to care for Maria’s safety... then we’ll look after old Nearl’s granddaughter for him.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: You’re leading her to ruin and you know it clear as day.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Wasted my breath... go on, pretend I never came, then.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: ...Any trouble those two sisters make should be theirs to sort out.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: ...How long do we have to keep hiding, Sonna?
attributes.name: Ashlock Knight

attributes.content: Don’t rush it, jeez...
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: We can't stop… we don’t want any of our Infected here to starve. And we already lost one we could’ve saved.
attributes.name: Ashlock Knight

attributes.content: Heading back to the arena’s too risky, though. Dunno how the National Council feels about us, either...
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: National schmational... I don’t there’s any justice in Kazimierz anymore. Not even in the law.
attributes.name: Ashlock Knight

attributes.content: But we can’t let ourselves forget we’re all in the right. It’s not our fault if they say right’s wrong. The problem is if the National Council comes in to say we’re guilty, then we lose. Just like the Radiant Knight.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: But, hey... haha, their minds must be blown. Honestly, I did NOT expect it either... What do you think they’ll do next?
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: Think they’ll be watching all the Infected now? The ones we bought and freed...
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: ...It’s all been one game. Die to the arena, or die to some assassin’s arrow. No difference.
attributes.name: Ashlock Knight

attributes.content: Hahaha. You got that right.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: But let’s just hold out a biiiit longer. No reason to get Nearlie and all her people wrapped up in our stupid underground fight.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: ...Alright. I’m gonna trust that you have a plan.
attributes.name: Ashlock Knight

attributes.content: Who the hell knows? We’ve been doing this dumbass tightrope act since the beginning.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: Aren’t you scared, Ashley?
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: Sonna!
attributes.name: Ashlock Knight

attributes.content: We’re not the sort of people to run into some resistance and think twice about it. Remember all we did just to get some titles... and the blood we spilled for them.
attributes.name: Ashlock Knight

attributes.content: ...You’re right, you’re right. I’m thinking too hard.
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: Yeah, you are... long as we’re together, long as we’ve got a pair of fists to fight back with, we’re golden.
attributes.name: Ashlock Knight

attributes.content: Man, you’re getting better and better at talking all the time. Where’d that 'Ashen Curse' go again?
attributes.name: Flametail Knight

attributes.content: Oop. You mad now?
attributes.name: Flametail Knight
